Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You wanted to see the floating Ring Ruin,
Totsie, but you fell asleep?

You're really missing out...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hey, Totsie. Rain doesn't stop the
Zonai Survey Team from working on
their research.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So maybe we should work outside in the
rain too.<sp:5:1:0> Maybe...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Good grief. Late! I can't start eating
without Totsie.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Wait, you're not Totsuna! <sp:5:0:0>What business
do you have startling folks like that?
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I heard that <clr:0000>stone slabs<clr:ffff> were found in
the other four Ring Ruins sites. I wonder
if there's one in this ring too.
What do you think is written on
them, Totsie?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>I'm starving! <sp:5:1:0>Let's see if I can whip
something up in the kitchen...
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I bet only the very best researchers from
the <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team<clr:ffff> get picked to work
on valuable sites like the Ring Ruins.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>If we join the survey team, I'd want to
investigate amazing places like that!<sp:5:1:0>
Right, Totsie?
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>With all the ruins falling from the sky, the
Upheaval really hit Kakariko Village hard.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>The chief was smart to take advantage
and use tourism to liven things up.<sp:5:1:0>
Right, Totsie?
